price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߋ߬ߓߌ߬ ߞߴߏ߬ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߒߠߋ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߬ ߘߐ߬ߜߍ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-innamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
